tips.content:
We do not tolerate any form of racism​ or hate speech, users found doing so will be banned.
  • RESPECT ALL members of the server, this is a community that will welcome you.
  • DO NOT Force people to RP. It is not an RP Server it is a PVE simulator server.​
  • DO NOT Troll other players​, excessive harassment of other players will be dealt with via a kick or ban.
  • DO NOT Spam chat​ or voice, doing so will get you kicked or banned.
  • DO NOT Drive recklessly or speed around the Police stations, Fire Stations and Hospitals​.
  • USE ONLY English in the Global chat, please use the International Channel.
  • USE Common sense​, and don't make us add another rule.

After creating your character, here are some helpful tips;
  • All vehicles in the world are locked, you will not be able to access them.
    You can buy a free vehicle from the store to get started.
  • Pressing the [F5] key will open a menu which will give you access to the jobs on the server.
  • Pressing the [HOME] key will open a the PDA, here you'll find the store for guns and cars.
  • Pressing the [M] key will open a the interactive menu, this will allow you to change your style and some additional options.
  • You can change any of the binds via the Key Bindings in the games settings, under "FiveM".
